Oh :neutral_face:
I going to try and be creative here xD Maybe create a template that extends the invisible customer-portal xD

:sweat_smile:
yeah that might be the play

Hey everyone,

I'm experiencing an issue with the *chat feature* and I was hoping someone here could offer some advice. This week, the "Close" text appears with strange padding and an unusual border-radius. I've attached screenshots of our chat widget from last week and how it looks now.
The HubSpot support team says we can't add or inherit CSS from our template. So now I'm thinking it might be a *HubSpot bug*, but I'm not totally sure.

Is anyone else encountering a similar problem? Any ideas on how to reset it to its default state?

Thanks in advance!
This also happen in the editor, not only the page

:HubSpotheart:*Help your fellow HubSpot Developers!*:HubSpotheart:

This Slack lives and breathes by its community. If you're posting a question, take a moment and click around a few channels to see if there are any questions you can help answer. Instant karma!
Hi Antonio, this is part of our latest widget design update. Let me know if you have any specific feedback!
